articles.title: South Africa : Two Women Caught With Stolen Government Medicine At Joburg Bus Te
articles.summary: Police in Limpopo are still investigating a deadly bus crash that killed 43 people and exposed stolen government drugs on board. A Cuban doctor in Limpopo was arrested earlier this month for keeping hospital medicine at home and released on warning. Two women were arrested in Braamfontein on Thursday after police discovered stolen government medicine packed inside a cross-border bus heading to Harare, Zimbabwe.
